name: Anyone's Diary
storyline: Meet “Anyone”, a silent character that you should guide and assist through the pages of its diary while facing the darkest events of its past. Will “Anyone” be able to overcome its demons... or will they consumed it?
summary: Third-person virtual reality puzzle-platformer where you discover the story of the character Anyone and help them by solving inner conflicts represented by puzzles.
